channel.title: CVE Feed for Elementor -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Elementor -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-29455|2024-09-17T03:22:59.924Z -- elementor -- elementor%20website%20builder%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: DOM-based Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Elementor's Elementor Website Builder plugin <= 3.5.5 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-31289|2024-08-08T18:43:50.950Z -- elementor -- hello%20elementor
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Elementor Hello Elementor.This issue affects Hello Elementor: from n/a through 3.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-47504|2024-08-02T21:09:37.352Z -- elementor -- elementor%20website%20builder
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in Elementor Elementor Website Builder allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Elementor Website Builder: from n/a through 3.16.4.

item.title: CVE-2023-33922|2024-08-02T15:54:13.430Z -- elementor -- elementor%20website%20builder
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Elementor Elementor Website Builder.This issue affects Elementor Website Builder: from n/a through 3.13.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-35656|2024-07-22T10:02:00.509Z -- elementor -- elementor%20pro
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Elementor Elementor Pro allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Elementor Pro: from n/a through 3.21.2.

item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Elementor Elementor Website Builder allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS), Stored XSS.This issue affects Elementor Website Builder: from n/a through 3.22.1.
